mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_status, t.task_start_date, t.task_end_date, t.task_content, m.member_no, m.name, m.profile_name, m.profile_path, f.file_no, f.file_type, f.file_name, f.file_path FROM task t INNER JOIN project p ON p.project_no = t.project_no INNER JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no INNER JOIN attached_file f ON t.task_no = f.task_no WHERE t.project_no = #{project_no}
